mapper.select: select * from tb_product where summary like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') order by p_idx desc limit 0, 5
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product (m_idx, category, product_name, product_code, brand, summary, detail, start_date,end_date,origin_file_name1,save_file_name1, origin_file_name2,save_file_name2,price,discount_rate,quantity) values(#{m_idx},#{category}, #{product_name}, #{product_code}, #{brand}, #{summary}, #{detail}, #{start_date},#{end_date},#{origin_file_name1},#{save_file_name1}, #{origin_file_name2},#{save_file_name2},#{price},#{discount_rate},#{quantity})
insert into tb_cart (c_idx, p_idx, m_idx, c_quantity ) values(#{c_idx},#{p_idx}, #{m_idx}, #{c_quantity})
insert into tb_order (m_idx, p_idx, c_quantity, payment_status) values(#{m_idx},#{p_idx},#{c_quantity}, 0)
